entity.name: Chinmay Sarupria
entity.description: It allows to generate Zerodha account opening application forms with text based seal for account types like HUF, Private Limited, LLP and Partnership. It also generates annexures on entity letterhead, KYC, UBO and other documents thereby significantly speeding up the account opening process and helps in drastically reducing seal based errors.

channels.description: Will accept direct bank transfers. Please e-mail for details.

plans.name: Starter Support
plans.description: This will cover the development cost as well as future updates and maintenance.
